resources.string: This app is a reimplementation of Fujifilm\'s WiFi app. Expect bugs! There are no promises that it will be better than the official app.
Your camera\'s WiFi menu should be accessible from the \'Fn\' button on the top of the body.
Sorry, modern cameras with Bluetooth aren\'t supported yet. That\'s on the roadmap!
If you aren\'t satisfied with the app, then you can return your copy for a full refund :)
Default image landscape painting is by me :)
This app is in development! Plz report bugs!"
